name: The VACA
description:
Install instructions

The VACA is a super a funny and challenging game made by Submersivo Game Studio. This project started as part of an internal Game Jam.

The Aliens are trying to abduct the Cows and you're one of those who need to survive!

Avoid the dangers and get coins in order to otbain lots of powerful costumes, unlock achievements and beat you friends' scores!

How to Play

Tap the screen continuously in order to launch the cow upwards.

Do it in a quick and smart way in order to avoid the obstacles!
